languages.text: {n}Из вокса Фабрикатор-Цензора вырывается хриплый смех.{/n} "Есть вещи страшнее смерти, троглодит{mf||ка}. Подчинить свое существование ложной догме, обречь священные машины, связанные с немощной плотью, на бесцельные исчисления... отказано".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из вокса Фабрикатора вырывается хриплый смех.{/n} "Есть вещи страшнее смерти, чужа{mf|к|чка}. Подчинить свое существование ложной догме, обречь священные машины, связанные с твоей немощной плотью, на бесцельные исчисления... отказано".

languages.text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса Фабрикатор-Цензора вырывается хриплый смех.{/n} "Есть вещи страшнее смерти, троглодит{mf||ка}. Подчинить свое существование ложной догме, обречь священные машины, связанные с немощной плотью, на бесцельные исчисления... отказано".

{n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

languages.text: {n}铸造审查师的音阵装置中发出了嘶哑的笑声。{/n}“有些事情比死亡更加可怕，猩猩。那就是将自己的存在托付给错误的信条，强迫那些受到脆弱肉体束缚的神圣机器进行毫无意义的计算……我否决你这样的想法。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}铸造审查师的音阵装置中发出了嘶哑的笑声。{/n}“有些事情比死亡更加可怕，猩猩。那就是将自己的存在托付给错误的信条，强迫那些受到脆弱肉体束缚的神圣机器进行毫无意义的计算……我否决你这样的想法。”

languages.text: {n}Una risa ronca brota del voco del fabricator-censor.{/n} «Hay cosas más temibles que la muerte, troglodita. Someterse a un falso dogma, condenar máquinas sagradas atadas a endeble carne a unos cálculos baladíes... rechazo el mero concepto».
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una risa ronca brota del voco del fabricator-censor.{/n} «Hay cosas más temibles que la muerte, troglodita. Someterse a un falso dogma, condenar máquinas sagradas atadas a endeble carne a unos cálculos baladíes... rechazo el mero concepto».

languages.text: {n}かすれた笑い声がファブリケーター・センサーのヴォクスから聞こえてくる。{/n}「死よりも恐ろしいものがある、野蛮人よ。偽りの教義に自分という存在を従わせて、弱々しい肉体に縛られた神聖な機械に無意味な計算を強いること…その概念は拒否する」
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}かすれた笑い声がファブリケーター・センサーのヴォクスから聞こえてくる。{/n}「死よりも恐ろしいものがある、野蛮人よ。偽りの教義に自分という存在を従わせて、弱々しい肉体に縛られた神聖な機械に無意味な計算を強いること…その概念は拒否する」

languages.text: {n}Ein heiseres Lachen dringt aus dem Vox des Fabricator-Zensors.{/n} "Manche Dinge sind erschreckender als der Tod, Höhlenmensch. Die eigene Existenz einem falschen Dogma unterwerfen, heilige Maschinen verurteilen, die von schwachem Fleisch zu sinnlosen Berechnungen gezwungen werden ... Euer Vorschlag ist abgelehnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein heiseres Lachen dringt aus dem Vox des Fabricator-Zensors.{/n} "Manche Dinge sind erschreckender als der Tod, Höhlenmensch. Die eigene Existenz einem falschen Dogma unterwerfen, heilige Maschinen verurteilen, die von schwachem Fleisch zu sinnlosen Berechnungen gezwungen werden ... Euer Vorschlag ist abgelehnt."

languages.text: {n}Le vox du fabricator-censeur laisse échapper un rire éraillé.{/n} « Il existe des choses plus effrayantes que la mort, troglodyte. Placer son existence sous l'égide d'un faux dogme, condamner les machines sacrées aux calculs inutiles d'êtres de chair... La notion est rejetée. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox du fabricator-censeur laisse échapper un rire éraillé.{/n} « Il existe des choses plus effrayantes que la mort, troglodyte. Placer son existence sous l'égide d'un faux dogme, condamner les machines sacrées aux calculs inutiles d'êtres de chair... La notion est rejetée. »

languages.text: {n}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün voksundan boğuk kahkahalar geliyor.{/n} "Ölümden daha korkutucu şeyler var mağara insanı. Varoluşunu sahte bir dogmaya teslim etmek, çelimsiz bir bedene sarılmış kutsal makineleri anlamsız hesaplamalara mahkûm etmek... Bu düşünceyi reddediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Hoarse laughter comes from the Fabricator-Censor's vox.{/n} "There are things more frightening than death, troglodyte. To submit one's existence to a false dogma, to condemn sacred machines bound by feeble flesh to pointless calculations... the notion is rejected."

traits.locale_text: {n}Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün voksundan boğuk kahkahalar geliyor.{/n} "Ölümden daha korkutucu şeyler var mağara sakini. Varoluşunu sahte bir dogmaya teslim etmek, çelimsiz bir bedene sarılmış kutsal makineleri anlamsız hesaplamalara mahkûm etmek... Bu düşünceyi reddediyorum."
